concept.title: IEC 61850 SDC List

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Sensor data concentrator (SDC) listing and IEC 61850 stream mappings for telemetry and monitoring.

conbody.p: The default logical device (LD) for all IEC tags for SDC is V1_SDC_1_LD1.

The IEC tag path format is LN$FC$DO$DA.
Logical node (LN)
Functional constraint (FC)
Data object (DO)
Data attribute (DA)
conbody.note: Depending on the system type and design, some values might not be available.

section.title: Digital Values
section.p: Data format: BooleanExept for the IEC path LPHD1$ST$PhyHealth$stVal:q:t which is integer..
